TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceController extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 表示 Windows 服务并允许连接到正在运行或者已停止的服务、对其进行操作或获取有关它的信息。

span.span: Represents a Windows service and allows you to connect to a running or stopped service, manipulate it, or get information about it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用类来连接到并控制现有服务的行为。You can use the class to connect to and control the behavior of existing services. 创建的实例时类，您可以设置其属性，以便它与特定的 Windows 服务进行交互。When you create an instance of the class, you set its properties so it interacts with a specific Windows service. 然后可以使用类来启动、 停止和以其他方式操作该服务。You can then use the class to start, stop, and otherwise manipulate the service. 最有可能会使用组件中管理容量。You will most likely use the component in an administrative capacity. 例如，可以创建 Windows 或 Web 应用程序将发送自定义命令到通过服务实例。For example, you could create a Windows or Web application that sends custom commands to a service through the instance. 这会很有用，因为服务控制管理器 (SCM) Microsoft 管理控制台管理单元中不支持自定义命令。This would be useful, because the Service Control Manager (SCM) Microsoft Management Console snap-in does not support custom commands. 创建的实例后，您必须设置两个属性来识别它进行交互的服务： 计算机名称和你想要控制的服务的名称。After you create an instance of , you must set two properties on it to identify the service with which it interacts: the computer name and the name of the service you want to control. > [!NOTE] > 默认情况下，设置为本地计算机，因此不需要更改它，除非你想要设置为指向另一台计算机的实例。By default, is set to the local computer, so you do not need to change it unless you want to set the instance to point to another computer. 通常情况下，服务作者编写代码来自定义与特定命令关联的操作。Generally, the service author writes code that customizes the action associated with a specific command. 例如，一个服务可以包含代码以响应命令。For example, a service can contain code to respond to an command. 在这种情况下，为自定义处理任务运行之前系统可以暂停服务。In that case, the custom processing for the task runs before the system pauses the service. 服务可以处理的命令集取决于其属性，例如，可以设置到服务的属性`false`。The set of commands a service can process depends on its properties; for example, you can set the property for a service to `false`. 此设置将呈现`Stop`命令对该特定服务不可用，它会阻止您停止在 SCM 中的服务，从而禁用必需按钮。This setting renders the `Stop` command unavailable on that particular service; it prevents you from stopping the service from the SCM by disabling the necessary button. 如果你尝试停止你的代码中的服务，系统将引发错误，并显示错误消息"无法停止`servicename`。"If you try to stop the service from your code, the system raises an error and displays the error message "Failed to stop `servicename`." ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将类控制`SimpleService`服务示例。The following example demonstrates the use of the class to control the `SimpleService` service example. [!code-csharp[ServiceControllerClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceControllerClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/VB/program.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Continue() cil managed

summary.span: 在服务暂停后继续该服务。

span.span: Continues a service after it has been paused.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您调用对于服务，其状态首先更改为`ContinuePending`然后，当方法返回时，它将更改为`Running`。When you call for a service, its status is first changed to `ContinuePending` and then, when the method returns, it is changed to `Running`. 不能调用服务的服务控制器状态直到`Paused`。You cannot call for the service until the service controller status is `Paused`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将方法继续暂停的服务。The following example demonstrates the use of the method to continue a paused service. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. [!code-csharp[ServiceControllerClass#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/CS/program.cs#5)] [!code-vb[ServiceControllerClass#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceControllerClass/VB/program.vb#5)]

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
abstract member Dispose : bool -> unit override this.Dispose : bool -> unit

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放任何托管对象所持有的所有资源，此的引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时小心不要引用已经释放的早期调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息并，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ExecuteCommand(int32 command) cil managed

param.name: command
param.span: 应用程序定义的命令标志，指示要执行的自定义命令。

span.span: An application-defined command flag that indicates which custom command to execute.

param.span: 此值必须介于 128 和 256 之间（均含）。

span.span: The value must be between 128 and 256, inclusive.

summary.span: 对服务执行自定义命令。

span.span: Executes a custom command on the service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当您调用，服务的状态不会更改。When you call , the status of the service does not change. 如果该服务已启动，则状态仍然`Running`。If the service was started, the status remains `Running`. 如果服务已停止，则状态仍然`Stopped`，依次类推。If the service was stopped, the status remains `Stopped`, and so on. 若要处理自定义命令，该服务必须重写方法，并提供一个处理程序由标识命令`command`参数。To process the custom command, the service must override the method and provide a handler for the command identified by the `command` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法来执行中的自定义命令`SimpleService`服务示例。The following code example shows the use of the method to execute custom commands in the `SimpleService` service example. [!code-csharp[ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceContoller_ExecuteCommand/VB/module1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pause() cil managed

summary.span: 挂起服务的操作。

span.span: Suspends a service's operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能调用服务的服务控制器状态直到`Paused`。You cannot call for the service until the service controller status is `Paused`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将方法来暂停服务。The following example demonstrates the use of the method to pause a service. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. summary.span: 通过将属性重置为其当前值来刷新属性值。

span.span: Refreshes property values by resetting the properties to their current values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使， ，和属性下一步引用时重置为其当前值。The method causes the , , and properties to be reset to their current values when they are next referenced. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将方法来获取服务的状态。The following example demonstrates the use of the method to obtain the status of a service. 代码指示服务到暂停，然后等待状态以反映更改。The code instructs a service to pause, and then waits for the status to reflect the change. 此示例摘自一个更大的示例为提供类。This example is part of a larger example that is provided for the class. member this.ServiceName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置对此实例引用的服务进行标识的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that identifies the service that this instance references.

value.span: 对此 实例引用的服务进行标识的名称。

span.span: The name that identifies the service that this instance references.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识服务到服务控制管理器。The identifies the service to the Service Control Manager. 更改此属性将导致实例绑定到另一个服务，它不会更改哪些服务控制管理器的 Microsoft 管理控制台管理单元中显示。Changing this property causes the instance to bind to another service, it does not change what the Service Control Manager's Microsoft Management Console snap-in displays. 在实现自定义服务时，此属性的值必须与记录中的服务的名称相同属性的相应类。When you are implementing a custom service, the value of this property must be identical to the name recorded for the service in the property of the corresponding class. 在代码中，通常设置`main()`函数的可执行文件。In code, the is usually set in the `main()` function of the executable. 重置时属性时，设置的属性的方法设置此实例的为空字符串 ("")。When you reset the property, the method that sets the property sets this instance's to an empty string ("").

summary.span: 此服务所依赖的服务集。

span.span: The set of services that this service depends on.

value.span: 实例的数组，其中每个实例均与使此服务运行所必须运行的某个服务关联。

span.span: An array of instances, each of which is associated with a service that must be running for this service to run.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何服务中数组未运行，将无法启动此服务。If any service in the array is not running, you will not be able to start this service. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类显示的 Messenger 服务所依赖的服务集。The following example uses the class to display the set of services that the Messenger service is dependent on. summary.span: 获取此对象引用的服务类型。

span.span: Gets the type of service that this object references.

value.span: 值之一，用于指示网络服务类型。

span.span: One of the values, used to indicate the network service type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务类型指示系统如何使用该服务。The service type indicates how the service is used by the system. 值属性表示一组使用按位 OR 运算符组合的标志。The value of the property represents a set of flags combined using the bitwise OR operator. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类，以在本地计算机上显示的设备驱动程序服务。The following example uses the class to display the device driver services on the local computer. remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能调用服务的服务控制器状态直到`Running`。You cannot call for the service until the service controller status is `Running`. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类，以检查 Alerter 服务是否已停止。The following example uses the class to check whether the Alerter service is stopped. 如果服务已停止，该示例启动服务，并等待，直到服务状态设置为。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service and waits until the service status is set to . MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Status As ServiceControllerStatus

summary.span: 获取由此实例引用的服务的状态。

span.span: Gets the status of the service that is referenced by this instance.

value.span: 值之一，指示服务是正在运行、已停止还是已暂停，或者启动、停止、暂停或继续命令被挂起。

span.span: One of the values that indicates whether the service is running, stopped, or paused, or whether a start, stop, pause, or continue command is pending.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 状态指示服务的当前状态。The status indicates the current state of the service. 可能的值集包含多个指示状态更改命令是否处于挂起状态。The set of possible values includes several that indicate whether a state-changing command is pending. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类，以检查 Telnet 服务的当前状态。The following example uses the class to check the current status of the Telnet service. 如果服务已停止，该示例将启动此服务。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service. 如果该服务正在运行，此示例将停止该服务。If the service is running, the example stops the service. [!code-cpp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CPP/servicecontroller.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CS/servicecontroller.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/VB/servicecontroller.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Stop() cil managed

summary.span: 停止该服务以及任何依赖于该服务的服务。

span.span: Stops this service and any services that are dependent on this service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果任何服务依赖于该服务用于其操作，它们将先停止此服务已停止。If any services depend on this service for their operation, they will be stopped before this service is stopped. 属性包含的服务依赖于此集。The property contains the set of services that depend on this one. 如果停止此服务依赖的服务，请调用对此服务中的方法父服务的方法。If you stop a service that this service depends on, call the method on this service within the method of the parent service. 属性包含此服务依赖的服务。The property contains the services that this service depends on. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类，以检查 Telnet 服务的当前状态。The following example uses the class to check the current status of the Telnet service. 如果服务已停止，该示例将启动此服务。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service. 如果该服务正在运行，此示例将停止该服务。If the service is running, the example stops the service. [!code-cpp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CPP/servicecontroller.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CS/servicecontroller.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ServiceController#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/VB/servicecontroller.vb#2)]

summary.span: 等待服务达到指定状态。

span.span: Waits for the service to reach the specified status.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WaitForStatus(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus desiredStatus) cil managed

span.span: The status to wait for.

summary.span: 无休止的等待服务达到指定状态。

span.span: Infinitely waits for the service to reach the specified status.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用挂起应用程序的处理，直到该服务已达到所需的状态。Use to suspend an application's processing until the service has reached the required status. > [!NOTE] > 方法等待每个状态检查间隔大约 250 毫秒。The method waits approximately 250 milliseconds between each status check. 无法检测到更改为观察到服务的事例`desiredStatus`并立即向另一个状态在该时间间隔内。 cannot detect the case of the observed service changing to the `desiredStatus` and then immediately to another status in that interval. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类，以检查 Alerter 服务是否已停止。The following example uses the class to check whether the Alerter service is stopped. 如果服务已停止，该示例启动服务，并等待，直到服务状态设置为。If the service is stopped, the example starts the service and waits until the service status is set to . [!code-cpp[ServiceController#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CPP/servicecontroller.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ServiceController#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/CS/servicecontroller.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ServiceController#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/ServiceController/VB/servicecontroller.vb#1)]

exception.span: 参数不是 枚举中定义的任意值。

span.span: The parameter is not any of the values defined in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: public void WaitForStatus (System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus desiredStatus, TimeSpan timeout);
.method public hidebysig instance void WaitForStatus(valuetype System.ServiceProcess.ServiceControllerStatus desiredStatus, valuetype System.TimeSpan timeout) cil managed
Public Sub WaitForStatus (desiredStatus As ServiceControllerStatus, timeout As TimeSpan)

span.span: The status to wait for.

param.name: timeout
param.span: 一个 对象，指定服务在到达指定状态前需要等待的时间量。

span.span: A object specifying the amount of time to wait for the service to reach the specified status.

summary.span: 等待服务达到指定状态或等待指定的超时过期。

span.span: Waits for the service to reach the specified status or for the specified time-out to expire.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用挂起应用程序的处理，直到该服务已达到所需的状态。Use to suspend an application's processing until the service has reached the required status. > [!NOTE] > 方法等待每个状态检查间隔大约 250 毫秒。The method waits approximately 250 milliseconds between each status check. 无法检测到更改为观察到服务的事例`desiredStatus`并立即向另一个状态在该时间间隔内。 cannot detect the case of the observed service changing to the `desiredStatus` and then immediately to another status in that interval.

exception.span: 参数不是 枚举中定义的任意值。

span.span: The parameter is not any of the values defined in the enumeration.

exception.span: 为 参数指定的值过期。

span.span: The value specified for the parameter expires.
